org.grails.plugins.jaxrs.provider

Class MessageBodyWriterSupport<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grails.plugins.jaxrs.provider.ProviderSupport
      • org.grails.plugins.jaxrs.provider.MessageBodyWriterSupport<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of object to be written to the response entity.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSONWriter, XMLWriter

    public abstract class MessageBodyWriterSupport<T>
extends ProviderSupport
implements javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<T>
    Base class for simple message body writers.
